Scripts.OnClick: ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, self:GetParent()); PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Only sell grey items, always (overrides sell list)

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Sell things that are in the auto sell list

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Manually sold items added to auto sell list

Scripts.OnClick: ToggleDropDownMenu(nil, nil, self:GetParent()); PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn");

Scripts.OnEditFocusLost: db.AutoSell["SoulboundLow"]=self:GetText(); sml_print("BestSeller","Auto sell soulbound item minimum level set to "..db.AutoSell["SoulboundLow"]);
db.AutoSell["SoulboundHigh"]=self:GetText(); sml_print("BestSeller","Auto sell soulbound item maximum level set to "..db.AutoSell["SoulboundHigh"]);

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Change ranges of sell bop item levels dynamically based on dungeon you are in

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Sell food & drink that are out leveled

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Sell non quest class quest items (like Alterac Valley Swiss)

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Auto select quest rewards worth the most gold

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Do not complete if ilevel of quest rewards are higher than equipped

FontString.name: $parentText
FontString.text: Detailed selling information when you visit vendor
